Class Costumer

java.lang.Object
components.Costumer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class Costumer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node
This class represents a costumer of the delivery company
Version:
3.00 12 July 2021
Author:
Israel Avihail 308298363, Ofir Golan 315585323
See Also:
